name: Umbra (Grimm Svenkerud)
description:
With insperations from Bloody Trapland and Unfair Mario, Umbra brings the challanges of trail and error gameplay. Play as Svampman,  a small mushroom trying to flee the horrors of the dark woods. 

This game is hard, it's unfair, you will probobly not complete the whole game before giving up, or will you? We made this game for the best of players, thos who has the tenacity to complete this incredibly hard game.

We who made this

This game was made as a part of our last projects at LBS Södra, a high school focused on game development.

  • 2D
    • Sharon Dimas
    • Emil Karlsson
    • Diana Vallin
  • Program and Design

    • Grimm Svenkerud
